allow-location-dialog.title: Allow access to your location
allow-location-dialog.description:
Your Twake needs to always be authorised to access your phone's location in order to memorise and help you analyse your movements, even when the app is not in use.

It will NEVER be passed on to anyone without your request.

You can deactivate this feature from the Coach CO2 app settings.

install-flagship-app-dialog.title: Scan the QR Code
install-flagship-app-dialog.text:
or go directly to the App Store
or Play Store to install the Twake Workplace app
install-flagship-app-dialog.a11n: Go to the Twake Workplace application download page
